snippet.title: Monochromaniacs Wishlist Trailer
snippet.description:
Monochromaniacs is a mesmerizing and competitive party game for local-multiplayer!

https://store.steampowered.com/app/826300/Monochromaniacs/

Wishlist on Steam today!
